H0.text: Some Americans claim to have seen a Sasquatch; by what name is it better known . Bigfoot

H1.text: Some Americans claim to have seen a Sasquatch; by what name is it better known . Sasquatch

H2.text: Some Americans claim to have seen a Sasquatch; by what name is it better known . Wildman

H3.text: Some Americans claim to have seen a Sasquatch; by what name is it better known . Oh-mah

A4.text: Bigfoot, also commonly referred to as Sasquatch

A5.text: Burns coined the term 'Sasquatch', believed to be the anglicized version of sasq'ets (sas-kets), roughly translating to 'hairy man'

A6.text: Bigfoot is a large, hairy mythical creature said to inhabit forests in North America, particularly in the Pacific Northwest.
